display_long_description:
In this multiplayer, physics-based VR horror game, you must use your wits and agile movement to outsmart and evade relentless enemies. You and your team are dropped into a hostile. procedurally-generated wilderness with one simple objective: escape. But a hostile and relentless presence is stalking you. The game features:

    Familiar physics-based climbing and swinging mechanics that allow you to navigate through dense overgrowth and crumbling ruins, which are all while a sinister and ever-present danger lurks in the shadows.
    Intense survival horror that builds a sense of constant dread. Every sound matters, every motion is a risk, and every decision can mean the difference between life and death.
    Up to 20 players working together to escape, or abandoning their friends in the face of terror. The wilderness is unforgiving, but with up to 20 players, can you escape?

Features

    Physics-based VR Locomotion: Master agile, physics-driven movement to climb, swing, and scramble through the environment. Your agility is your greatest tool for survival, but also your greatest vulnerability.
    Procedurally Generated Wilderness: Explore a hostile, ever-changing wilderness where no two experiences are the same. This ensures endless replayability and unpredictable encounters with the monsters lurking within.
    Relentless AI Monsters: Evade a diverse cast of terrifying AI monsters, each with unique behaviors and hunting patterns. You'll feel their presence constantly as the
